title: An apology
content: I must apologize for repeated messages but I got no responses until I checked spam this evening. Somehow the one message went to an email account that does not exist. I went 12 days unable to send mail and somehow tonight it was fixed. I have to think there was a patch made that solved the problem. But yes, I did repeated messaged hoping for an answer. I am sorry someone was offended but I was desperate and got NO answers to my email address. As a Mozilla/thunderbird supporter I am disappointed.
creator: lorilohman

title: photos
content: All pictures sent to me do not download in Thunderbird as an acceptable format to open and save or print. They all turn to "part 1.1" or 1.2 from a jpg or png, etc. I have to open them on my server, then save them to my computer without sending them to my PC.
creator: pj42
